cause.description:
Vote for me cause you probably werent gonna vote in the first place.
I know what our school fuckin needs. And thats me.
The President needs to be someone whos been in everyone's shoes. Just like me :)
And if none of that convinces you, Ill give u candy. And a smile.
1. Candy for all
2. No unfair suspensions or arrests
3. Dean Korr looses her job
cause.mission: get lindsay into Presidency so shit gets done
cause.name: Lindsay For President
